thread.title: Nick Lachey Involved in Nasty Uber Car Crash, Shared Pic on Instagram
thread.title_full: Nick Lachey Involved in Nasty Uber Car Crash, Shared Pic on Instagram

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Nick Lachey Involved in Nasty Uber Car Crash, Shared Pic on Instagram
text:
Comments Nick and his wife Vanessa Minnillo were going on a date night in Uber car when they were involved in the crash. 
Nick Lachey and his wife Vanessa Minnillo had a scary run-in on Saturday, Oct. 10, when their Uber car crashed with another car. The former boy band singer and his actress wife were going on a date night when they were involved in the crash. Nick documented the nasty moment and then shared on his Instagram page a photo that showed a white car's hood bashed in after running into the front car's trunk. "A word of advice always wear your seatbelt when you @uber There is no such thing as a guaranteed safe ride. #datenight," the VH1 host captioned the image. A photo posted by Nick Lachey (@nicklachey) on Oct 10, 2015 at 7:21pm PDT The following day, Nick took to Twitter to let fans and followers knew that despite the incident he and Vanessa, fortunately, are doing fine. "For the record, @VanessaLachey and I are both fine after our little @uber accident," he tweeted. "Just a sobering reminder to always buckle up!" he added. For the record, @VanessaLachey and I are both fine after our little @uber accident. Just a sobering reminder to always buckle up! — Nick Lachey (@NickLachey) October 11, 2015
